Sparkle in the Void of Space

Sparkle in the Void of Space
섬광이 흩날리는 우주 공간
Sparkle in the Void of Space
閃光燦爛的宇宙空間
閃光燦爛的宇宙空間
Sparkle in the Void of Space
kDescription

A confrontation between an army of fighters and a battlestar, the shadow of a gargantuan lifeform in the wreckage of a space station, flying lasers and missiles, giving off sparkling flashes of light. Will you lead your starship to victory in destroying the enemy fleet? Will your dimensional fighter bring defeat upon the vile lifeforms? The raising of the curtain of war is at hand.[#Legal]

Will you lead your starship to victory in destroying the enemy fleet? Will your dimensional fighter bring defeat upon the vile lifeforms? The raising of the curtain of war is at hand.[#Legal]

대치 중인 우주 항공모함과 전투기의 무리들, 우주 기지의 잔해에 도사리는 거대생명체의 그림자, 난무하는 레이저와 미사일, 그때마다 빛나는 섬광. 우주전함을 조작하여 적 함대를 격파할까? 차원 전투기를 몰아 괴생명체를 쓰러뜨릴까? 싸움의 막이 지금 오르고 있다.[#Legal]

A confrontation between an army of fighters and a battlestar, the shadow of a gargantuan lifeform in the wreckage of a space station, flying lasers and missiles, giving off sparkling flashes of light. Will you lead your starship to victory in destroying the enemy fleet? Will your dimensional fighter bring defeat upon the vile lifeforms? The raising of the curtain of war is at hand.[#Legal]
宇宙航空母艦與戰鬥機大軍正對峙著，隱藏在宇宙基地殘骸中的巨大生命體陰影，交錯飛舞的雷射與飛彈，譜出燦爛的閃光。想要操作宇宙戰艦擊潰敵軍艦隊？還是駕駛次元戰鬥機打倒兇惡的生命體？戰爭正要揭開序幕。[#Legal]
